rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {04, 05, 06, 06G, 07, 07G, 07PG, 11, 42, 50PG, 76, 78}

unitName: The child in society: Promoting children's wellbeing and responding to child maltreatment
description: This unit explores a number of issues related to social work practice that involves children; particularly children whose well-being may be at risk or who have suffered child abuse or neglect. Attention will be drawn to  the relationship between the child, the family, the community and the state, with a particular focus on children's perspectives, children's status, and children's rights.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
